A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I rrally enjoyed TFA. Awesome visuals and music. One wild ride that feels like it pushes boundaries for the sake of it. Perhaps I am too old to enjoy the humor and too cynical to appreciate the story. I saw things I liked but the timing and execution seems out of place\, it was hard to connect with this movie. Perhaps my expectations were too high? I don't want a rehash of previously told stories\, but I do want a story that feels natural in its progression. It's Star Wars so everyone is going to see it\, but how you will feel afterward is anyone's guess.\nI wish I liked it more\, but I am glad some are getting enjoyment from it.
